MADE IN LOS ANGELES WITH LOVE

ItemECommerce.longDescription:

The free flow of information and education is essential to freedom.

MADE IN LOS ANGELES WITH LOVE

ItemMatrix.description: Beyond Yoga Lift and Support Bra

ItemECommerce.longDescription: Feel sexy and secure in our best-selling bra. A plunging neckline combined with a supportive structure and our always-comfortable Supplex material ensures that this will be your go-to bra for years to come. This bra will hold you tightly through even the most gravity-defying poses. Mix and match with any of our performance camis or layer under your favorite knit top to further improve the look of any outfit. Throw out any bra you've had before, because you won't want them anymore.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• Removable pad inserts
  • Racerback shoulder straps
  • Supportive, yet plunging neckline

ItemECommerce.longDescription: A wide scoop neck and a billowy fit, make this crop sweatshirt subtly sexy. Raglan shoulders and a low-back hem make this great for leisure sports and low-key days.

  • Rolled
  • Cropped front
  • Longer Back

ItemECommerce.longDescription: The Racerback Drawstring Tank is a BEYOND YOGA best seller - from the Ethereal Collection. A moderately loose fitting body offers full coverage, while dual drawstrings shortening or lengthening depending on desired fit. This performance tank is nicely paired with any of the Supplex or Heather Gray performance bottoms. For a stylish approach, couple this tank with denim, heels or flats. Multiple uses, but perfect for a variety of workouts.

• Racerback shoulder straps
  • Scooped neckline
  • Adjustable length
  • 51% Polyester / 47% Nylon / 2% SpandexSpandex
  • Heather Gray blend with luxuriously soft hand

ItemECommerce.longDescription:
The Topo Fleece Jacket. Growing up around mountain towns in the west the ubiquitous fleece made an impression on us. It was great for the elements then and it’s great now. Our version has the simple styling we remember with a trim fit. Great either as a layer or a jacket on it’s own.

Made in USA from genuine Polartec fleece.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• Polartec 200 Fleece and nylon.
  • Trim fit with reinforced elbow patches. Snap chest pocket.
  • Small: Pit to Pit: 22″ / Front: 25″ / Neckline to End of Cuff: 31″
  • Medium: Pit to Pit: 23″ / Front: 26″ / Neckline to End of Cuff: 31.5″
  • Large: Pit to Pit: 24″ / Front: 27″ / Neckline to End of Cuff: 32″
  • X-Large: Pit to Pit: 25″ / Front: 28″ / Neckline to End of Cuff: 32.5″

ItemECommerce.longDescription:
Growing up we had "the" blanket. It was a fixture on the back of the sofa, it was for napping in the back of the Mercury and camping on Mt. Jefferson. It was that extra layer our dads swore "made all the difference" under our sleeping bags. Around the fire it was the shawl we sometimes fell asleep in.

We at Topo had fond memories and we wanted to revisit that blanket. We had a few criteria, had to be wool, had to be made in the USA, couldn't be so fancy you didn't want to use it, but nice enough that it felt like a luxury on the road. So, we bring you the Topo Camp Blanket. Made in the USA from 100% wool. Get out there and enjoy it.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• Dimensions: 65"w x 90"l
  • Materials: 100% Wool
  • Origin: Made in the USA

ItemECommerce.longDescription: This wonderfully simple cap is made with soft acrylic yarn. Whether you’re on the slopes, or running around town, our watch cap will keep you warm. Best of all, it is made right here in the USA.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• 100% Acrylic
  • One Size, Cotton Label
  • Made in the USA

ItemECommerce.longDescription: A time tested classic, ragg wool is heavy duty, sturdy and warm. Our cap has a fleece liner for added warmth and softness on the ears, and features our mini map patch. Best of all, it is made right in the USA.

ItemECommerce.longDescription: This wonderfully simple cap is made with soft acrylic yarn and features our mini map patch. Whether you’re on the slopes, or running around town, our watch cap will keep you warm. Best of all, it is made right in the USA.

ItemECommerce.longDescription: The Topo Designs Web Belt is easy enough for every day wear but tough enough to outlast most of your wardrobe and look good doing it. The 1.5" belt is made from highly durable nylon webbing with a solid aluminum buckle. The unique round buckle features teeth to grab the webbing and is engraved on the back with Topo Designs, Colorado USA. All parts are made and assembled in the USA.

  • Machined Aluminum, Nylon Webbing
  • Distinctive round shape, engraved logo
  • Made in USA

Take it hiking, take it running, take it with you for just enjoying a nice day; treat yourself to something that makes all of it that much better.

Beyond Yoga's Supplex is a quick-drying performance fabric with generous stretch and full recovery. Highly resistant to wind, moisture and abrasion, our Supplex retains its color and shape wash after wash, making this fabric ideal for active wear.

Four way stretch to expand with your muscles in all movement, elastic free, breathable to reach the highest peaks, chafe resistant and antibacterial.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• High-Low elastic FREE waistband
  • THEE most comfortable legging out there!
  • Made with love in the USA
  • 79% RECYLCED P.E.T. / 21% Spandex

ItemECommerce.longDescription:
Our only “one-size” bra top, this simple yet stylish top will fit our smaller to average bust sized customers. This bra top is ideal for more petite women and is a great style for both in and out of classes. Pair it with your favorite tank top for a great look and pop of color! The bandeau is fully-lined for maximum support and hold. 

Available sizes: One Size. Not sure One Size is your size? Our stretchy, flexible fabric fits and flatters all body types, sizes 0-10. Try one and see for yourself!

ItemMatrix.description: LVR Organic Asymmetrical Zip Hoodie 'Crystal Wash'
Purusha Love Your Self Bamboo Wrap

ItemECommerce.longDescription:
love yourself bamboo wrap

you are letting go of the need to be something else other than you. you is all you can be, and it's the privilege of a lifetime. experience the ultimate love, loving yourself fully, and watch that love expand infinitely into the world.

90% bamboo 10% spandex in charcoal grey. features a wrap around funky fit that is the perfect layering piece to wear with your favorite tank.

Purusha People is a 2 person production team, hand screen printed by hayley, hand sewn by nadya, each item has had a special amount of time, work, and attention paid to it.

We know you will love it as much as we do!

photo : www.katieadelsberger.com
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• Handmade in Los Angeles
  • 90% bamboo 10% spandex
  • Perfect for layering with your favorite tank.

ItemECommerce.longDescription:
let there be light! focus on the good and remember you are a light being.

luxurious and kitten soft 100% modal in eggshell white. long and lean fit you can wear pulled over your yoga leggings or ruched up at the waist. printed with the words LIGHT in black on the right ribs.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• Handmade in Los Angeles
  • hand printed by hayley, hand sewn by nadya
  • luxurious and kitten soft 100% modal

ItemECommerce.longDescription:
we watch our lives move from day to day, and notice the cyclical nature of all things. in a way, this is soothing to know life will ebb and flow, constantly changing as we evolve from moment to moment, much like the phases of the moon.

luxurious and kitten soft 100% modal in pacific blue. long and lean fit you can wear pulled over your yoga leggings or ruched up at the waist. features bound nylon seams and a shelf bralette. printed with purusha's signature tiny black moon phases on the center back.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• Handmade in Los Angeles
  • Luxurious and kitten soft 100% modal
  • Hand printed by hayley, hand sewn by nadya

ItemECommerce.longDescription:
WE CANNOT RESIST THIS PULLOVER COWL NECK HOODIE.  LVR DESIGNERS HIT IT BIG WITH THIS AMAZINGLY FUNCTIONAL, COMFY, AND UNIQUE TOP.  YOU CAN WEAR IT HAS A HOODIE, A COWL NECK TOP, OR EVEN OFF THE SHOULDERS!  THROW IT OVER JUST ABOUT ANYTHING AND WE GUARANTEE YOU WILL LOOK AND FEEL AMAZING.

Organic, soft, and incredibly comfortable, LVR is designed and handmade in Los Angeles, California for you to live in blissfully every.

LVR’s contemporary, yet classic collection includes flattering and functional yoga pants, tops, dresses, and scarves fit for both active and casual lifestyles.  Each original design features buttery-soft organic cotton blends, colorful yet low-impact dyes, vintage washes, and is produced at the highest quality.

LVR is currently sold in high-end boutiques and yoga studios across the US, Europe, Japan, Canada, and the Middle East.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• 50% ORGANIC COTTON 50% RECYLED POLY : VINTAGE MINERAL WASH
  • HANDMADE IN LOS ANGELES CA
  • MACHINE WASH

ItemMatrix.description: LVR Organic Sleeveless V-neck Angled Bottom

ItemECommerce.longDescription:
NOT JUST A V-NECK TEE, WE CAN'T RESIST THIS SHIRT WITH ITS STYLISH, LONGER CUT.  WITH ITS SUPER SOFT COTTON FABRIC, YOU WON'T WANT TO RESIST IT EITHER! THE MINERAL WASH ADDS A VINTAGE FEEL TO THIS SPECIAL TOP.

ItemECommerce.longDescription:
Bicycle by Dowentown Betty is a yoga * street * beach clothing line.  It is not yoga clothing specifically, but it is clothing for yogis.  Some pieces are great for the yoga studio, and some are great for after the yoga studio, and some are great for both on the mat & off.  It is a casual glamour, that feels as good as naked. 

It can be worn dressed up for business meetings, but it is so comfy you might be tempted to wear it to bed...and then get up the next day, and wear it again ;)

Downtown Betty believes that clothing that is meant to fit well & last years in a person’s wardrobe, alongside their other favourite pieces.  A few quality pieces that you love to wear, rather than more that you don’t, are better ~ for you & for the planet.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
..... the longsleeve version of the Stable Dress - sleek lines to the knee, tragically hot with boots or heels.

  • Machine wash, hang to dry, easy peasy & it feels as good as naked ;)
  • Fabric blends are either Organic Cotton/Lycra, Cotton/Lycra, Bamboo/Cotton/Lycra.
  • All products are designed, hand cut to order & made in Vancouver, by people who live in Vancouver.

ItemMatrix.description: LVR Organic Fold Over French Terry Leggings

ItemECommerce.longDescription: THESE UNBELIEVABLY COMFY FOLD-OVER YOGA LEGGINGS ARE NOT ONLY INCREDIBLY FLATTERING BUT EXTREMELY FUNCTIONAL AND EARTH-FRIENDLY. THE RAW CUT BOTTOMS AND FOLD OVER ALLOW THE WEARER TO ADJUST ITS LENGTH TO A PERFECT FIT.  THE LYCRA MAKES THESE LEGGINGS IDEAL FOR FULL RANGE ACTIVITY IN ANY SEASON.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• 94% organic cotton 6% lycra : French Terry
  • Handmade in Los Angeles, CA
  • Machine wash

ItemECommerce.longDescription: The first Greenland Down Jackets were made in the 1970s and it is now one of Fjällräven’s most classic and loved jackets. Hip-length model, made from durable wind and water resistant G-1000 Original with a pliant nylon lining and high-quality down padding. A fixed, well-fitting hood protects from cold winds. A two-way zipper is hidden behind a protective flap with press buttons. Two hand pockets that are both top-loaded and have openings from the sides. Two chest pockets with flaps and an inner pocket. Drawcord at the hem and buttoned adjustments at the sleeve cuffs.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• Classic down jacket in durable G-1000 Original with fixed, well-fitting hood.
  • Hip-length model with several practical pockets.
  • Two-way CF zipper covered by a placket with press buttons.
  • Adjustable at bottom hem and at sleeve end.

ItemECommerce.longDescription: One of Fjällräven's big classics for winter use. Timeless model with pile fleece on the inside that will serve you for many years thanks to the durable G-1000®. Reinforced at the shoulders and yoke. 2-way zipper with buttons in the front and at the sleeve cuffs. Snugly fitting hood.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• Classic jacket with warm lining that will withstand wind and wear for many years.
  • Six pockets and a fixed, snugly fitting hood.
  • Reinforced shoulders and elbows
  • 2-way opening bellow hand pockets

ItemECommerce.longDescription: Long down parka that keeps you warm even over your rear and legs. Perfect if you find other parkas too heavy and bulky. Comfortably lightweight. Channels padded with fine goose down. Warm, cosy hood with elastic around the edge. High collar protects the chin and neck. Two side pockets, one inner mobile pocket and one breast pocket.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• Long parka with down channels and Pertex Microlight outer fabric. Lightweight but still warm.
  • Fixed adjustable storm hood with fleece lining inside collar, for comfort and protection.
  • Two-way front zipper.2 bottom pockets, 1 mobile pocket inside left bottom pocket and 1 inside chest pocket.

ItemECommerce.longDescription: Classic, comfortable jacket with warm pile fleece on the inside, perfect for cold winter walks or as a comfortable jacket for everyday use. Hip-length model with straight cut, made with G-1000® fabric, which makes it both durable and wind and water resistant. Fixed hood. 2-way zipper with buttons. Adjustable hem and sleeve cuffs. Two breast pockets, two large 2-way pockets with flaps and an inner pocket.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• Durable jacket in G-1000® with straight cut and warm pile fleece on the inside.
  • Fixed hood and large 2-way pockets.

ItemECommerce.longDescription: "Comfortable, well-fitting down vest in classic Fjällräven style. Made from durable wind and water resistant G-1000 Lite and lightly padded with 500 cuins down in stitched-through channels. Lined with pliant Pertex® Quantum-polyamid. The two-way zipper can be opened from the bottom for ventilation and a flap on the inside protects against cold winds. A buttoned chest pocket and two zippered hand pockets, whose linings function as open inside pockets. A timeless, durable garment that provides extra warmth during chilly autumn walks or on the way to and from work."
ItemECommerce.shortDescription: Well-fitting, lightly padded down vest in durable G-1000 Lite. Classic Fjällräven style with one chest pocket and two hand pockets.

ItemECommerce.longDescription: How did the tiger get its stripes? This one got them from being darn tough. These women’s lifestyle socks deliver legendary Darn Toughness and fashion to boot. Ultra soft, fine gauge Merino Wool makes them a year round, all weather favorite. Light, simple, laid back. True Seamless construction gives them a smooth, almost invisible feel from start to finish. Pure Bliss. Still made in Vermont. Guaranteed for life.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• 65% Merino Wool, 33% Nylon, 2% Lycra Spandex
  • Still made in Vermont
  • Guaranteed for life.

ItemMatrix.description: DARN TOUGH - GOOD WITCH CREW LIGHT

ItemECommerce.longDescription: “Are you a good witch or a bad witch?” This sock is definitely all good. The Good Witch delivers legendary Darn Toughness and fashion to boot. Ultra soft, fine gauge Merino Wool make it a year round, all weather favorite. Light, simple and laid back. True Seamless construction gives these socks a smooth, almost invisible feel from start to finish. Pure Bliss. Still made in Vermont. Guaranteed for life.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• 65% Merino Wool, 33% Nylon, 2% Lycra Spandex
  • Still made in Vermont
  • Guaranteed for life.

ItemMatrix.description: DARN TOUGH - PEBBLES CREW LIGHT CUSHION

ItemECommerce.longDescription: These socks feel as good as walking barefoot down a beach of tumbled pebbles. So that’s what we named them. These women’s lifestyle socks deliver legendary Darn Toughness and fashion to boot. Ultra soft, fine gauge Merino Wool makes them a year round, all weather favorite while Light Cushioning provides just enough bounce for everyday use. True Seamless construction gives them a smooth, almost invisible feel from start to finish. Pure Bliss. Still made in Vermont. Guaranteed for life.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• 65% Merino Wool, 33% Nylon, 2% Lycra Spandex
  • Still made in Vermont
  • Guaranteed for life.

ItemMatrix.description: DARN TOUGH - STRIPES MICRO CREW CUSHION

ItemECommerce.longDescription: Perfect for 14’ers or quick day hikes, our Micro Crew Stripe has just the right amount of sass and toughness. Cushioning along the bottom of the foot provide the perfect amount of support while a smooth, performance fit assures there’s no slipping, no bunching, and no blisters. Fine gauge knitting makes this Merino Wool sock a true workhorse that’s supremely comfortable, breathable and fast drying. Cool in the summer, warm in the winter and naturally antimicrobial so it repels bacteria and odor —a great feature when you need to get an extra day (or two) out of your socks. Still made in Vermont. Guaranteed for life.
ItemECommerce.shortDescription:
• 65% Merino Wool, 33% Nylon, 2% Lycra Spandex
  • Still made in Vermont
  • Guaranteed for life.
